Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Consumable
        • Pizza
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Item>

    public class Pizza
extends Consumable
    The Pizza class extends the Consumable class, implementing the eat() method, which returns a descriptive String about the eating of the Pizza, and increases the number of slices eaten until this equals the number of total slices, at which point the Pizza becomes "consumed".
    Version:
    2016-09-22
    Author:
    Nicholas

      The total number of slices the full Pizza has.

      The number of slices of the Pizza that have been eaten.
